title: Sammy Stuffit
description: Sammy Stuffit likes to collect stuff. By the time he is an adult, he has so much stuff that he has to find places to store it. Realizing that his stuff does not make him happy, Sammy gives it all away. Illustrations show how much stuff Sammy has collected over the years.
highFrequencyWords: boxcars, collecting, fancier, frustrated, selfish, stuff, stuffed, warehouses
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Simple Sentences                : Identify and create simple sentences
phonics: Multiple Meaning Words                : Identify multiple-meaning words
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
